void Gorilla::Layer::setAlphaModifier ( const Ogre::Real &  alphaModifier  )  [inline]

function. setAlphaModifier desc. Set's a modifier to the alpha component of all colours of the vertices that make up this layer note. Final alpha value of all vertices in this layer is the following:

final_alpha = vertex_alpha * alphaModifier;

Alpha modifier should be between 0.0 and 1.0
